description: Matrix square of Stirling-1 Triangle A008275.
comments: Exponential Riordan array [1/((1 + x)*(1 + log(1 + x))), log(1 + log(1 + x))]. The row sums of the unsigned array give A007840 (apart from the initial term). - _Peter Bala_, Jul 22 2014Also the Bell transform of (-1)^n*A003713(n+1). For the definition of the Bell transform see A264428. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 28 2016
maple: # The function BellMatrix is defined in A264428.# Adds (1,0,0,0, ..) as column 0.BellMatrix(n -> (-1)^n*add(k!*abs(Stirling1(n+1,k+1)), k=0..n), 10); # _Peter Luschny_, Jan 28 2016
mathematica: max = 9; t = Table[StirlingS1[n, k], {n, 1, max}, {k, 1, max}]; t2 = t.t; Table[t2[[n, k]], {n, 1, max}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 01 2013 *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
